name: Coinbase Portfolio
description: A NodeJS application to view your Coinbase Portfolio from the Numbar app.

HOST.description: This is required by Node app running on Heroku. Do Not Modify.

COINBASE_API_KEY.description: Insert your Coinbase API Key here.

COINBASE_API_SECRET.description: Insert your Coinbase API Secret here.

CLIENT_AUTH_KEY.description: Create a password to securely access your portfolio from Numbar.
